headline.main: Giraud Is Seized for Nazis, Then Vichy Holds Up Return; NAZIS TAKE GIRAUD AT HAVEN IN VICHY

lead_paragraph: General Henri Honore Giraud, French hero of two wars, who escaped from a German prison camp last month after his capture two years ago while in command of the French Ninth Army, was reported in private advices to THE NEW YORK TIMES last night to have been handed back to the Germans and then returned in custody to the outskirts of Vichy.
abstract: Gen Giraud reptd seized but Vichy Govt said to oppose return to Germany
